page.title: 02ECOLOGY
page.content: My square covers{COLAN CHURCH}which has a tower and Colan Wood.It also has a lovely view of Porth Reservoir which often has boats sailing on it in nice weather.Around it are lush green fields which often contain cattle, grass or barley. Around the fields there are lots of trees which are mainly Sycamore or Oak. {COLAN WOOD}is owned by the {HOBLYN ESTATE}which as been allowed to run into disrepair because they cannot trace the rightful heirs. In the wood there was a spacious farmhouse and surrounding barns but this is now in ruins and covered with ivy. Included in the buildings is a {BELL TOWER}which has ivy all around it. All the stonework is ELVAN and near the Belltower there is a disused watertank which is rusted away at the top.
